subject: Vam Reactors
description_text:
Hello, i bought the haptic feedbacks from amazon and i got the control box
which is in the packages from the Reators. So my problem is that i cant
connect the haptic with my pc. When i open the simsonn manager it says that
my control box is in upgrade mode. I did what it says but i still have the
same issue. Also simhib doenst recongnise the reactors. I need some help
please.


Sincerely
Andy

conversations.body_text: Hi Andreas Balan,    Please provide your order number, and we will resolve this for you as soon as possible.
ID 为 8819 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8819  
      主题: Haptic Reactors wont work  
      描述:  I order the Haptic Reactors for my pedals. I dont have Simsonn pedals. I plugged in the controls box and the reactors and simhub doesnt recognizes them. When i start the software it says Simson Flasher Control Box is upgrade mode. Although i released the upgrade the mode doesnt change

Hi Andreas Balan,  Please provide your order number first. If you are using the ProX Ultra, make sure the upgrade button on the controller box is released (popped out), then reconnect the USB cable. The device will enter normal operation mode.

Hello, I ordered it from amazon. I tried everything, but i think my control
box is broken because it keeps deconnecting after a while.
Can I get an exchange maybe of the control box?
I only use the haptics. I dont use ur pedals. I have heusinkveld sprints
atm. Simsonn manager shows that the pedals are connected but I dont have
any.
I dont know what to do anymore. I tried a lot of hours every possible way
to fix it and it doesn't work. Changing Software, ports, updating firmware,
with Simson Manager, also with simhub, with differential usb hubs, on usb
2.0/3.0/3.2 and used ground cabels. Nothing worked !

Ordered 302-0041059-4912357

Sincerely,

Andreas



support@simsonn.com

Hi Andreas Balan,  Regarding the use of Heusinkveld Ultimate pedals with our controller, I will perform testing tomorrow and get back to you. At this stage, it appears that the wiring order may need to be adjusted. I will confirm this after testing and provide a detailed solution.

Hello,

My pedals are not connected to the simsonn control box.
On the simsonn control box i have only the vams connected, nothing else. I
mounted the Haptics on the pedals thats what i meant.

Sincerely,

Andreas

support@simsonn.com
Hi Andreas Balan,  Please provide a photo of the installation, along with a screenshot of the vibration settings page in SIMSONN Manager. I will check the version and help further diagnose the issue.
